sentences.en: All expenses are to be equally divided between you and I.
sentences.cn: 一切费用由我和你平均分担.

sentences.en: All non - violent religious and political beliefs should be respected equally.
sentences.cn: 对所有非暴力的宗教和政治信仰应予以同等尊重.

sentences.en: All these techniques are equally effective.
sentences.cn: 所有这些技术都同样有效。

sentences.en: Children will find other exhibits equally absorbing.
sentences.cn: 孩子们会对其他展品一样感兴趣。

sentences.en: Diet and exercise are equally important.
Divide the cake into quarters and share it equally.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕分成四份,大家平均享用.

sentences.en: Each link that makes up a chain is equally important.
sentences.cn: 链子上面的每一环都同等重要,缺一不可.

sentences.en: Everyone is treated equally, irrespective of race.
sentences.cn: 不分种族，每个人都受到公平对待。

sentences.en: He willed that his property be divided equally among his children.
sentences.cn: 他在遗嘱中讲明将自己的财产均分给子女.

sentences.en: His predecessor was accorded an equally tumultuous welcome.
sentences.cn: 他的前任受到了同样热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: Ministers can equally credibly claim that the opposition is to blame.
sentences.cn: 部长们也能同样令人信服地宣称，反对派应该受到指责。

sentences.en: She is equally at home on the singles or doubles court.
sentences.cn: 她单打和双打都能得心应手。

sentences.en: Since none of the four is dispensable, they are equally important.
sentences.cn: 实际上,这四种力量既然是缺一不可的, 所以是同等重要的.

sentences.en: They came to an accord that profits should be shared equally.
sentences.cn: 他们达成协议,收益由大家均分.

sentences.en: We are equally honest with aged and child customers.
You must have a good education, but practical training is equally important.
sentences.cn: 你必须接受良好的教育，不过实际培训也同样重要。

words.tran_cn: 对手；匹敌；同辈；相等的事物
补偿器；补偿电路；平衡装置（等于equalizer）
均衡器，[电] 平衡器；平衡装置；使相等的东西
使相等（equalize的过去时和过去分词）
使均衡；使平等；均分；补足（等于equalize）
同样地；相等地，平等地；公平地

phrases.tran_cn: adj. 等距的；等齿距的，等间隔的

trans.tran_en: to the same degree or amount
